Nicholas Sharma

Position Sprints

Class Senior

Hometown Mounds View, Minn.

Highschool Mounds View

Custom2 Sr.

Bio

Historical

Biography

2023-24: Outdoor: Competed in seven outdoor meets... Placed third in 4x100m relay at Drake Relays (Apr. 24-27) with time of 41.10... Placed sixth in 100m finals at NSIC Outdoor Championships (May 9-11) with time of 10.68... Placed 17th in 200 meter dash at NSIC Outdoor Championships with time of 21.83... Placed sixth in 4x100m relay finals at NCAA Division II Outdoor Championships (May 23-25) with time of 40.11... Indoor: Appeared in seven indoor meets in 60m dash... Placed ninth in 60m prelims at NSIC Indoor Championships (Feb. 23-24) with time of 6.93.

2022: Outdoor: All-NSIC in 100m... Participated in seven outdoor meets... Placed third in 100 meter dash at NSIC Outdoor Championships (May 11-13)... Placed seventh in 200 meters at NSIC Outdoor Championships with personal record time 21.48 seconds... Took 10th place in 4x100 meter prelim at NCAA Division II Outdoor Track & Field Championships (May 25-27)... Indoor: Competed in nine meets for the Mavericks... Placed sixth in 60 meter finals at NSIC Indoor Championships (Feb. 25-26) with time of 6.98 seconds.

2021-22: Outdoor: Appeared in seven outdoor meets... Leg of winning 4x100 meter relay team with first place time of 41.25 seconds at NSIC Outdoor Championships (May 12-14)... Placed fifth in 100 meter dash at NSIC Outdoor Championships with time of 10.75 seconds... Indoor: Participated in seven indoor meets for MSU... Placed 10th in 60 meter dash prelim at NSIC Indoor Championships (Feb. 25-26) with time of 6.99 seconds... Placed 12th in 200 meter prelims at NSIC Indoor Championships with time of 22.75.

2020-21: Outdoor: Appeared in eight outdoor meets... Placed second in 100 meter dash finals at NSIC Outdoor Championships (May 13-15) with time of 10.60... Part of winning 4x100 meter relay team at NSIC Outdoor Championships with time of 40.72... Placed ninth in 200 meter prelims at NSIC Outdoor Championships with time of 22.00... Indoor: Participated in six indoor meets for the Mavericks... Placed fifth in 60 meter dash at NSIC Indoor Championships (Feb. 26-27) with time of 6.98... Placed third in 200 meters at NSIC Indoor Championships (Feb. 26-27) with time of 22.30...

2019-20: Indoor: Competed in 60 meter and 200 meter events... Placed fourth in 60 meter dash at NSIC Indoor Track & Field Championships (Feb. 28-29) with time of 6.94 seconds...

High School: From 2015-2019, Nick was a True Team Section Champion in Track and Field...In 2017, he was a Conference Champion and State Runner-Up in the 100m...In 2018, Nick was a Conference Champion and was a MSHSL State Runner-Up and USATF National Competitor...In 2019, Nick was Top 3 at Hamline Elite.

Personal: Birthday is July 8... Majoring in Business Marketing at Minnesota State... Son of Rozeli Sharma... Favorite song: Money Maker by Ludacris.
